extendedInfo.description: Imagine...connecting with your inner wisdomand finding crystal clear answers,a comforted heart, and a calm mind.Imagine doing that instantly, any time, any place.Welcome to Galaxy Tarot. An Oracle for the 21st Century.*** Tarot Card Reader & Tarot Encyclopedia ***Pull Cards, Cast Tarot Spreads and learn all about Tarot Cards!Features:- Gorgeous images from the classic 1909 deck like you've never seen them before. Looks beautiful on phones and tablets.- Three Tarot Spreads to choose from.- Interpretations from Galaxy Tarot's in-house Tarot expert, A.E. Waite's "Pictorial Key to the Tarot", and easy access to Wikipedia entries on each card.- Reversed card option including keywords and unique interpretations for every card.- Tarot encyclopedia linking each card to its symbols, suit, and number.- Card of the Day widget- Two stunning application themes, featuring high definition backgrounds and card backs.- Fully customizable Tarot deck; ability to shuffle deck, choose each card, or go instantly to your reading.- A unique spread analyzer that helps you understand the trends in your readings.- Ability to share spreads and cards using email and many other applications.- Ability to turn reversed cards, animations and sounds on or off, receive a notification of your Card of the Day, and many more ways to customize the app.Included spreads:- One Card- Past, Present, Future- Celtic Cross- RelationshipFollow us on Twitterhttps://twitter.com/galaxytoneJoin us on Facebookhttps://www.facebook.com/GalaxyTarot

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Great way to start the day, its real nice to know what to excpect .
reviews.author: Joseph Gobble

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: So easy to use, very good interpretations! Much easier then carrying my cards with me :) keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Natalie Lejeune

reviews.title: Best Tarot App
reviews.comment: This app is incredible. Includes 3 spreads and one card readings. What I find most resourceful is the breakdown of card description with keywords, card position, and detailed interpretation. Users can see what the symbols mean in a single card as well. I also love that I can access all cards to look up any card\'s meaning, which isn\'t usually available on other free version divination apps.
reviews.author: Nicole Graf

reviews.title: Fun entertaining
reviews.comment: Seems accurate Enjoyable
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This app is scary accurate. It is amazing and I highly recommend it for people who want a little bit more insight into their lives.
reviews.author: Rae Sinisgalli

reviews.title: If you are learning to read tarot, this is a must.
reviews.comment: I\'ve been reading tarot for years now, but I\'ve swapped through a bunch of different decks since I learned how to read my original one and now I sometimes forget what a card means because the image is different from what I learned off of. Instead of carrying a book around with me everywhere, I just carry my deck in a small pouch since I always have my phone with me. It\'s so convenient in case I forget what a card means. I love the encyclopedia so much.
reviews.author: Shelby Mari\303\251

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Great app and easy to understand. I can do a quick reading  anywhere  without pulling out the cards.
reviews.author: Feawguita N

reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: Simple to use and understand.  Awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A fun app
reviews.comment: Love the artwork! I usually pick a single card to determine how my day will go. I get \"the devil\" a lot...
reviews.author: Robert Butler

reviews.title: Great App!!!
reviews.comment: Love the options! Love the features! Great app to learn how to read tarot. Would like more available spreads.
reviews.author: Syn Zane

reviews.title: I recommed for those learning Tarot or having fun
reviews.comment: Free AP offers iron cross spread with classic tarot designed cards. Lots of detail in the descriptions. Card of the Day is a great way to learn the tarot deck and the meanings behind the symbolism.
reviews.author: Jeanette Evely

reviews.title: Really, really tuned
reviews.comment: I\'ve learned how to read the cards at 13 years old, from my mother. We have this in the family. I know the cards, and I\'ve played with a buch of tarot apps over the years. The thing with this app is, it\'s crazy how it is in resonance and synchronicity with the expression of the moment..!  Yes, I know that it\'s mostly my own energy creating / living the resonance, still, it is surprisingly just like drawing a card from a physical deck. Some decks are more \'tuned\' than others,  and this app is tuned :-)
reviews.author: Sebastien Matte

reviews.title: Pretty fun!
reviews.comment: Great way to spend a bit of extra time...also gets a bit creepy sometimes. Great app!
reviews.author: Kathy Crawford

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Sometimes the cards are so accurate and profund you can really believe. I love this app. I\'ll be using this app for a while.
reviews.author: Patricia Akosah

reviews.title: Great Tarot app!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been reading cards for almost 6 years and this app comes in very handy. This is also my favorite deck. Informative, fun and easy to use. It\'s Awesome!
reviews.author: Audrey Black

reviews.title: Teo thumbs up and a big smile
reviews.comment: I love this app. Its like  having real tarot cards... And the graphics are great
reviews.author: MarQuita Diallo

reviews.title: Great App.
reviews.comment: Beautiful graphics and perfect for expert & beginner. Luv it
reviews.author: Nansye Joyce

reviews.title: Very nice update
reviews.comment: The latest update is very good. It solved many bugs and has more descriptions. Thanks
reviews.author: Dario Rossi

reviews.title: Real
reviews.comment: Very accurate. I  myself and my Girlfriend, Impressed with the app. Or maybe its not an App... >.>
reviews.author: Amado Moreno

reviews.title: Update sucks
reviews.comment: It\'s choppy now and the card spreads are crappy. I preferred the older version. But, since I\'ve now updated I can\'t go back to the old version. Really disappointed!
reviews.author: Cynthia Mungaray
